law.catch_line: If a person is granted a deferral that extends the time to pay Montgomery County property tax or Pri...
law.text: If a person is granted a deferral that extends the time to pay Montgomery County property tax or Prince George's County property tax under § 10-201 of this article, the person shall pay interest on the county property tax payment from the due date without a deferral until the date that the county property tax is paid.
